prompts: Create a small, ground-type Pokemon that has a sandy appearance and is known for its digging abilities.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that thrives in desert environments and has bright yellow and beige colors.
Design a cute Pokemon with a round body shape and a penchant for hiding underground.
Generate a character that resembles a small creature with a hard, spiky back and big blue eyes.
Show me a Pokemon that is agile and quick, with a playful personality and a love for sandy areas.
Give me a Pokemon that has a sturdy build and is adept at burrowing in the ground.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the desert, with camouflaging colors and a shy demeanor.
